text: Elijah Sivister (11 December 1911 – 1993) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1993 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:English Football League players Category:Shirebrook Miners Welfare F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Ollerton Colliery F.C. players Category:Ripley Town F.C. players Category:Ilkeston United F.C. players Category:Ashfield United F.C. players Category:Creswell Colliery F.C. players
title: Eli Sivister
